attributes.action: change the current Housing Waiting List Points system in order not to penalise hardworking people with model children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After being on the "waiting list" for over 3 years, I am still having to pay four fifths of my income on privately renting a house, this is not a home, icant do anything to the decor, we have to be careful all the time in case we snag the carpets , ding the paintwork, damage the lawn. it is not a home it is where we live.  I work 40 hours a week I have 2 wonderful teenagers and we just want a home. Please sign if you think it is unfair that people get penalised for doing the right thing
